mapper.insert: insert into cmt_table(cmtWriter, cmtContents, boardId, memberId) values (#{cmtWriter}, #{cmtContents}, #{boardId}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select * from cmt_table where boardId = #{boardId} order by id desc
select * from cmt_table where cmtCreatedTime = (select max(cmtCreatedTime) from cmt_table where boardId = #{boardId})
